content:
I'm working on https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/78574
According to https://rustc-dev-guide.rust-lang.org/borrow_check/region_inference.html, region inference is a part of borror checking.
The codegen process is done after borrow checking from https://rustc-dev-guide.rust-lang.org/overview.html.
Is region inference nothing to do with codegen process?
